Gollum.description:
A Git Based Wiki.

Note: runs with UID:GID (1000:1000), so the configured share must provide the corresponding access.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

/wiki.description: Choose a share for wiki storage. E.g. a create a share called gollum-wiki-storage, with the owner corresponding to UID=1000 and GID=1000 to avoid permission errors.
/wiki.label: Wiki storage
